contenu.value: Montrer que : \[\left|\begin{array}{lll} 1 & 1 & 1 \\ a & b & c \\ a^2 & b^2 & c^2 \end{array}\right|=(c-a)(b-a)(c-b)\]

\[\begin{aligned} & \left|\begin{array}{ccc} 1 & 1 & 1 \\ a & b & c \\ a^2 & b^2 & c^2 \end{array}\right|=\left|\begin{array}{ccc} \mathcal{c}_1 & \mathcal{c}_2-\mathcal{c}_1 & \mathcal{c}_3-\mathcal{c}_1 \\ a & 0 & 0 \\ a^2 & b^2-a^2 & c^2-a^2 \end{array}\right| \\ & =(b-a)(c-a)\left|\begin{array}{ccc} c_1 & c_2 & \mathcal{c}_3-c_2 \\ 1 & 0 & 0 \\ a & 1 & 0 \\ a^2 & b+a & c-b \end{array}\right| \\ & =(b-a)(c-a)(c-b) \\ & \end{aligned}\]
